description: Hayato, otherwise chiefly known as Ike, is a fifteen-year-old high school student and has been Yuuji`s friend since junior high school. He carries the title "Megane-man" ("Glasses Man"), or Four-Eyes in the English version. He is secretly fond of Kazumi Yoshida. However, as Yuuji`s loyal (and best) friend, he is the one who helps her to show her feelings toward Yuuji.
name: Ike Hayato
